title: Matrix Addition and Scalar Multiplication
description: Interactive visualization demonstrating element-wise matrix addition and scalar multiplication with step-by-step calculation highlighting.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Linear Algebra
Matrices
Matrix Operations

learningObjectives: Calculate the sum of two matrices by adding corresponding entries
Multiply a matrix by a scalar by multiplying each entry
Recognize that both operations preserve matrix dimensions
Understand the element-wise nature of these operations
prerequisites: Understanding of matrices as arrays of numbers

learningObjectives: Understand the key concepts of matrix addition and scalar multiplication
Explore matrix addition and scalar multiplication through interactive visualization
